explains: n. 起源，起因；出身，血统；（原）产地；肌肉起端；神经（或血管）起端；（数）原点
wordGroup: country of origin 原产地；原产国
certificate of origin [商]原产地证书
place of origin 原产地；起运地点
origin of life 生命的起源；生命起源
point of origin 原点，起始点；起火点
fever of unknown origin 无明显病因的发烧
marine origin 海成；海相成因

sentences.en: The origin of the custom is obscure.
sentences.cn: 该习俗的起源鲜为人知。

sentences.en: The origin of the word remains obscure.
They talked about the competing theories of the origin of life.
sentences.cn: 他们谈论那些相互矛盾的生命起源理论。
